statements: UPDATE NetworkTrafficMonitoring SET traffic_speed = 1000 WHERE source_ip = '192.168.1.1';
UPDATE NetworkTrafficMonitoring SET quality_of_service = 'high', destination_ip = '10.0.0.1' WHERE traffic_speed > 500;
UPDATE NetworkTrafficMonitoring SET traffic_speed = 100.5, quality_of_service = 'high' WHERE source_ip = '192.168.1.1' AND destination_ip = '10.0.0.1';
UPDATE NetworkTrafficMonitoring SET quality_of_service = 'low', traffic_speed = 50.0 WHERE timestamp > '2022-01-01' AND traffic_type = 'HTTP';
UPDATE NetworkTrafficMonitoring SET traffic_amount = 500 WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE QualityOfService SET status = 'High' WHERE service_type = 'HTTP';
UPDATE NetworkTrafficMonitoring SET traffic_amount = 1000 WHERE id = 1
UPDATE QualityOfService SET response_time = 50, status = 'OK' WHERE timestamp = '2022-10-12 15:30:00'
UPDATE NetworkTrafficMonitoring SET data_sent = 1024 WHERE device_id = 1;
UPDATE NetworkDevices SET location = 'Data Center' WHERE device_id = 5;
UPDATE NetworkDevices SET location='Data Center' WHERE device_id=1;
UPDATE NetworkTrafficMonitoring SET data_sent=2500.75, destination_ip='192.168.1.100' WHERE device_id=2;
UPDATE Network_Traffic_Monitoring SET data_usage = 1500 WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE QoS_Management SET latency = 8.5, service_type = 'Priority' WHERE id = 3;
UPDATE Network_Traffic_Monitoring SET data_usage = 500 WHERE source_ip = '192.168.1.10' AND destination_ip = '10.0.0.1';
UPDATE QoS_Management SET service_type = 'Video Streaming', latency = 30.5 WHERE source_ip = '10.0.0.1' AND destination_ip = '192.168.1.10';
UPDATE NetworkDevices SET device_name = 'Router_A', device_capacity = 100 WHERE device_id = 1;
UPDATE NetworkOperators SET operator_type = 'ISP', operator_region = 'North America' WHERE operator_id = 3;
UPDATE NetworkDevices SET device_name = 'Router A', device_capacity = 150 WHERE device_id = 1;
UPDATE NetworkPerformanceMetrics SET metric_value = 98.7 WHERE device_id = 3 AND metric_name = 'Latency';
